name: Summer [Job]
description:
Take control of a young man looking to fill his time in the hot summer of 1969. rewind tapes and play some tunes to keep the groove!

 !Important note! : there is a critical bug in the game which can trap the player in a endless cycle of tape rewinding. be gentle with the game. and if you encounter such thing just give page a refresh. i'll try my best to fix it soon How the Game Goes (read before playing):

Every few seconds a customer arrives and places a tape on one of the tables. go up to that table and rewind his/ her tape. they will then pay and leave the shop

take too long to rewind and they will leave the shop and complain about it

take 3 complains and your business is shut!

Play music to keep the customers busy. they wont mind time passing if their favorite tape is playing

YOU also have a favorite tape! the Red Tape! play it and your character will move faster and rewind better!

You can find out which tape is the customers favorite by comparing the customers shirt with the color on the tape!
You also have a favorite tape too! it makes you work faster!

be careful tho! when a tape finishes you have to rewind them aswell!

how to play : 

  • WASD to move and Navigate menus
  • Get near the Tape Player (top left of the Room) and Press E to open the tape drawer
  • Press E on a Table (indicated by the white square) to rewind the tape on it

once in the tape selection menu:

  • WASD to navigate 
  • E to close the menu
  • F to play the selected Tape
  • R to rewind the selected Tape
